events.message: I received my order last week but unfortunately I want to request a refund because the product is not what I expected and I would like my money back.
The system has identified the customer's case as a refund request based on their mention of wanting their money back.
The case has been assigned to agent Emily T. to handle the refund request promptly and provide assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund swiftly, can you share the reason for the refund and any details about the product condition?
My order number is 45321. The product arrived on time but it doesn't match the description on your website, so I want to return it for a full refund.
Thank you for providing the details. We will initiate the refund process right away and send you a prepaid return shipping label via email.
I appreciate your quick response and the return label. I will send the product back today and await the refund confirmation.
We have received the returned product and processed your refund successfully. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Yes, the refund appeared on my card yesterday. Thank you very much for your help and swift processing!
We are glad to hear your refund was successful. We are closing this case now but feel free to contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey to help us improve our service in the future.
